raw_body: HANDY – Dr SRIKANTI (KANTI) – Daughter of the late Dr George and Kanmanie Handy,​ sister of Lakshman and George,​ sister-in-law of Judi and Indira,​ mother of Rohan (Mather),​ mother-in-law of Dineli,​ grandmother of David,​ Tanya and Sebastian,​ great-grandmother of Theodore and Jasper. Remains will lie at the Chapel (Near the Main Entrance of the Kanatta General Cemetery) from 3 p.m. on Saturday,​ 2nd September 2023,​ followed by a Service at 3.30 p.m. and Burial thereafter in the Anglican Section of the Cemetery.054655
